Water Purification.description: Boil for at least 1 minute or use purification tablets.

Food Storage.description: Store dry goods in sealed containers. Keep canned food in a cool, dry place.

First Aid.description: Always have a stocked first aid kit with antiseptic, bandages, and pain relief.

Shelter.description: Use tarps, mylar blankets, or natural resources to create temporary shelters.

Fire Making.description: Use a firestarter, waterproof matches, or create friction-based fires.

Navigation.description: Use a compass and maps. Learn to navigate using the sun and stars.

Barter and Trade.description: Identify barter-friendly communities. Offer useful skills or tradeable items.

Emergency Communication.description: Use HAM radios, CB radios, or encrypted messaging tools like Briar.
